package behaviourlevelinstructiontestapp.behaviourwithbehaviourlevelinstructions;

import org.junit.Test;
import org.junit.After;
import org.junit.Before;

import java.util.*;

import com.iksgmbh.sysnat.testcasejavatemplate.SysNatTestCase;
import com.iksgmbh.sysnat.test.testTemplateContainers.behaviourlevelinstructiontestapp.TestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer;

/**
* Executable Example for TestApplication 'BehaviourLevelInstructionTestApp'.
* Autogenerated by SysNat.
*/
public class Firstexecutableexample_Test extends SysNatTestCase
{
private static final String BEHAVIOUR_ID = "Behaviour with Behaviour Level Instructions";

protected TestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer testApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer;

public Firstexecutableexample_Test() {
executionInfo.register(BEHAVIOUR_ID, 6);
}

@Before
public void setUp()
{
super.setUp();
initNumberOfTestCases(6);
testApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer = new TestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer(this);
}

@After
public void shutdown()
{
if ( ! isSkipped() && executionInfo.isTestEnvironmentInitialized()) {
if (languageTemplatesCommon != null) languageTemplatesCommon.gotoStartPage();
}
testApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer = null;
super.shutdown();
}

private void prepareOnceIfNeeded()
{
if (executionInfo.isFirstXXOfGroup(BEHAVIOUR_ID))
{
languageTemplatesCommon.createComment("Start of OneTimePrecondition");
testApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.prepareOnce();
languageTemplatesCommon.createComment("End of OneTimePrecondition");
languageTemplatesCommon.createComment("");
}
}

@Test
@Override
public void executeTestCase()
{
try {
testApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.declareXXGroupForBehaviour("Behaviour with Behaviour Level Instructions");
testApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.startNewXX("First executable example");
languageTemplatesCommon.defineAndCheckExecutionFilter("-");
prepareOnceIfNeeded();
testApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.setBddKeyword("Feature");
testApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.setBddKeyword("Scenario");
testApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.setBddKeyword("Given");
testApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.prepare();
testApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.setBddKeyword("Given");
testApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.setFirstCondition();
testApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.setBddKeyword("When");
testApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.doFirstAction();
testApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.setBddKeyword("Then");
testApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.doFirstAssertion();

closeCurrentTestCaseWithSuccess();
} catch (Throwable e) {
super.handleThrowable(e);
}
}


@Override
public List<String> getNlxxFilePathAsList()
{
List<String> toReturn = new ArrayList<>();
toReturn.add("BehaviourwithBehaviourLevelInstructions");
toReturn.add("Firstexecutableexample");
return toReturn;
}

}
